canaccessR 0.0.0.9002
  • Reference

Socio-economic and demographic data of the Vancouver Metropolitan Area for Dissemination Areas.

Source: R/canaccessR-package.R
census_data_da_van.Rd

A simple features data frame with the boundary of Dissemination Areas in the Metropolitan Area. The boundary is unprojected (i.e., it is in latitude-longitude; CRS: WGS 84). The data frame contains a selection of socio-economic and demographic information for the Dissemination Areas.

Usage

data(census_data_da_van)

Format

A simple features data frame with 3,715 row and 53 variables:

Type

Type of statistical area: "DA" for Dissemination Area

GeoUID

Unique identifier of the statistical area

region

Identifier of the region: "van" for Vancouver

Households

Total number of households in dissemination area in 2016

CD_UID

Unique identifier of the census CD

Dwellings

Total number of dwellings in dissemination area in 2016

Population

Total population in dissemination area in 2016

CSD_UID

Unique identifier of the census CSD

CT_UID

Unique identifier of the Census Tract

CMA_UID

Unique identifier of the census Census Metropolitan Area

tot_age_popn

Total age population

age_0_to_14

Total population aged 0-14 years old in dissemination area in 2016

age_15_to_64

Total population aged 15-64 years old in dissemination area in 2016

age_65_plus

Total population aged 65 years and older in dissemination area in 2016

tot_cens_fam_priv_hh

Total number of census families in private households in dissemination area in 2016

fem_parent

define_fem_parent

LICO_AT

define_lico_at

tot_LICO_status_2015

define_tot_LICO

knwl_off_lang

define_knwl_off_lang

neither_EN_FR

define_neither_EN_FR

Aborin_ID_priv_HH

define_Aborin_ID_priv_HH

Aborin_ID

define_aborivin_ID

tot_priv_hh_hsing_suit

define_tot_priv_hh_hsing_suit

not_suitable

define_not_suitable

dwell_condtns

define_dwell_condtns

maj_rep_needed

define_maj_rep_needed

Name of the Census Metropolitan Area (CMA)

Simple features geometry

Source

Population: Canada Census 2016. See: https://mountainmath.github.io/cancensus/index.html

Examples

 data(census_data_da_van)
